games.title: Jump in Rhythm to the Hit! Cat Disco!
games.description:
üéµ The game "Jump in Rhythm to the Hit! Cat Disco!" offers a unique combination of cute cat meows and exciting pop music rhythms. Play along to a variety of popular tunes, including worldwide hits, and enjoy gorgeous visuals and kawaii design!

‚≠ê Main Features ‚≠ê
- A large selection of popular hits!
- Remixes of popular tracks with a fun "meow"!
- Easy one-touch screen control!
- Bright colors and fantastic design!
- A variety of kawaii cats ready for adventure!

üéÅ Don't miss out on the surprises we have prepared for you! Start the game "Jump in Rhythm to the Hit! Cat Disco!" and plunge into the fun world of musical adventures right now! üåàüêæüéÆ

üíïDon't forget to support us by leaving a review and comment if you liked the game!
If you have any comments about the game, please describe the problem in as much detail as possible and we will try to fix it quickly!
games.howToPlayText:
üïπÔ∏èThe game controls are very simple. To control a character:
On a smartphoneüì± - move your finger across the screen left and right.
On a computerüíª - move the mouse with the left button pressed.

üéØThe main goal of the game is to reach the end of the level by jumping on the tiles without falling.
- Guide your cat by helping him jump on the tiles to the beat of the music.
- Beware of missing tiles - your task is to complete as many levels as possible and unlock all the songs.
- Earn coins to unlock new cute cats and new popular tracks!

games.title: PopCats: Merge the cats!
games.description: PopCats: Merge the cats! is a fun online puzzle game where you combine matching cats to form bigger, cuter ones. Enjoy the playful feline stories while aiming for the top of the leaderboard. No downloads or sign-ups needed, perfect for all cat enthusiasts on any device!
games.howToPlayText:
- Connect identical seals into larger seals by clicking on the screen with your finger or mouse.
- To get to know a cat and find out its history, click on its image in the bottom panel.
- Make sure that the cats do not reach the top line, otherwise the game will end!
- You can change the next cat for watching ads.
- Use yarn to remove the interfering cat, and remember - the main thing here is not to miss!
- Collect points to take a leading position in the player rankings.
- Win by connecting the two biggest cats!
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/popcat-merge-the-cats-playgama?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Neko's Adventure
games.description: Neko‚Äôs Adventure is a vibrant platformer starring Neko, a playful cat trying to rescue his girlfriend. Explore 20 challenging levels, unlock the Power Beam to shoot fire, and face quirky enemies in a whimsical, fast-paced adventure full of charm, excitement, and cartoon fun!
games.howToPlayText:
Desktop

Left\Right keys - move
Up key - jump
Spacebar - shoots fire 

Mobile - Touch screen buttons

games.title: Furry Kung Fu
games.description:
Furry Kung Fu is a fun fighting game with cute cartoon graphics. You play as Catsei or his student Kung Fu Cat. You need to hit the opponent with a lot of punches, while dodging all kinds of objects flying at you, such as balls, comets, fire and pots. It's so much fun!

Engage in an epic Kung Fu battle with your opponent. Get coins, unlock player skins and new weapons!

Bright and memorable characters will keep you entertained, and simple game controls allow you to focus on battling countless hordes of pigeons, rats, aliens, crocodiles, and other animals. Can you collect weapons in battle and unlock all available maps? Two playable characters to choose from.
games.howToPlayText:
Furry Kung Fu is a fun fighting game with cute cartoon graphics. You play as Catsei or his student Kung Fu Cat. You need to hit the opponent with a lot of punches, while dodging all kinds of objects flying at you, such as balls, comets, fire and pots. It's so much fun!

Engage in an epic Kung Fu battle with your opponent. Get coins, unlock player skins and new weapons!

Bright and memorable characters will keep you entertained, and simple game controls allow you to focus on battling countless hordes of pigeons, rats, aliens, crocodiles, and other animals. Can you collect weapons in battle and unlock all available maps? Two playable characters to choose from
–ö–∞–∫ –∏–≥—Ä–∞—Ç—å
Control on the PC: by arrow buttons, on the smartphone - by swipes and taps on the screen.

Swipe: left/right arrow, tap on the screen to the left/right of the player.
Combo: repeatedly pressing the button in the direction where you want to apply a combo / multiple tap to the left or right of the player.
Sit down: down arrow / swipe down.
Jump: arrow up / swipe up.
Double jump (if available for a specific skin): double arrow up / two swipe up

Uppercut - squat and jump, arrow down and up / swipe down and up;
Attack from above - press the down arrow / swipe down while jumping.

The enemies drop weapons and lives. You can pick them up by tapping/tapping in their direction.

The enemy on the ball and comet can be shot down. The rat in the window can be turned off briefly by throwing a weapon at it.
Levels in the Survival game mode are unlocked as you progress through the main Campaign.

games.title: Brick Breaker Chipi Chipi Chapa Chapa Cat
games.description: Brick Breaker Chipi Chipi Chapa Chapa Cat is a fun meme game where you need to break bricks, collect power-ups for more fun breaking bricks, and watch Chipy Chipy Chipa Cat and El Primo Bara Bere dancing. Go through interesting and exciting levels in the fun game about Chippy Chippy Chippy Chappa Chappa Cat and El Primo. Pass levels of different difficulty and set a personal record. Play the Brick Breaker Chipi Chipi Chapa Chapa Cat game at now and have fun.
games.howToPlayText: Control the bottom area and hit the balls into the green blocks. Once all the green blocks are destroyed, the level will be completed. Collect falling bonuses in order to increase the number of balls and gain extra life.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/brick-breaker-chipi-chipi-chapa-chapa?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Kitten Never Dies
games.description: Join an interdimensional adventure to help a lost kitten find its way home! Solve unique challenges in each dimension. Cute, clever, and full of surprises‚Äîare you up for the challenge? Play now and test your puzzle-solving skills!
games.howToPlayText:
Embark on an interdimensional journey to aid the kitten in finding its way back home! Each dimension presents a unique challenge that you must overcome.

Think it's going to be a piece of cake? Oh, meow! Let's see if you've got what it takes!

Just tap a key, click with the mouse, tap the screen, or use your gamepad ‚Äî the kitty will know what to do!  
If you want to play together on the same computer: 
Player 1 selects a button
While Player 2 chooses a different one.

games.title: Cringe the Cat
games.description: One of the cattiest music games ever! This is a rhythm game similar to titles like Guitar Hero or osu!mania, but we have a cat here named Cringe who's gotta jump very hard in order to keep the Mouse peaceful. Funny animations, multiple button modes and more in Cringe the Cat!
games.howToPlayText:
Controls
Keyboard: F, G, H keys to hit platforms, ESC to pause
Touchscreen: 3 buttons at the bottom of the screen

games.title: Click Kitty Idle
games.description:
Click Kitty Idle‚Äì Fast-Paced Cat Clicker Challenge!
Click Kitty Idle is a fun and competitive idle clicker game where speed, timing, and strategy matter! Tap to feed your kitty, level up, and dominate the leaderboard in this addictively cute cat-clicking game!                                             
Why You‚Äôll Love It:
If you enjoy fast-paced clicker games with a twist, It‚Äôs not just about clicking‚Äîit's about clicking smart and fast.
Play now and prove you‚Äôve got the fastest¬†paws¬†in¬†town!

‚Ä¢Cute & competitive gameplay with pressure-based challenges!
‚Ä¢Buy fun food like tuna, milk, cheese & more!
‚Ä¢Unlock cute cat characters like Miss Pawlina and Captain Purrbeard!
‚Ä¢Boosters: Auto Click, Time Extension, and Massive Click Power!
‚Ä¢Compete for high scores and unlock achievements!
games.howToPlayText:
Use the left mouse button to interact with in-game UI

How to Play:
‚Ä¢You have 32 seconds to earn coins by clicking.
‚Ä¢Use coins to buy cat food before time runs out!
‚Ä¢Each time you buy food, the price increases (ex: 100 ‚Üí 860 ‚Üí more!)
‚Ä¢Upgrade your Click Value to +1, +2... and increase your speed!

games.title: Cartoon cat: naughty kitten
games.description:
Immerse yourself in the world of Cartoon Cat: Mischievous Kitten - an action-stealth game where you are a nimble kitten collecting delicious sausages and escaping from many dangers!

What awaits you:

Roaring robot vacuum cleaners: avoid noisy machines, hide in secluded corners.

Hooligan pranks: mess around in people's apartments - throw objects, distract the residents, but don't get caught!

Hide and seek: use furniture, boxes and shadows to hide from your enemies.

Chases and traps: escape from vicious dogs and rush through the streets, beware of cars.

Your goal:

Collect as many sausages as possible.

Maneuver between enemies and traps.

Save all lives and find the exit from each level.

Ready to test yourself in the most fun (but dangerous!) kitty adventure of the season? Then go ahead - Cartoon Cat is waiting for you!
games.howToPlayText:
On the phone, the cat is controlled with a joystick for movement and a button for hitting.

On a computer, the control looks like this:

Forward: W key or up arrow.
Back: S key or down arrow.
Left: A key or left arrow.
Right: the D key or the right arrow.
You can use the left or right mouse button to perform a kick.

games.title: Cats Block Puzzle
games.description:
Just drag and drop cats onto the puzzle board and see if you can make them all fit perfectly! üß© Each puzzle has its own unique shape and gets more challenging as you play, which will make your brain think differently. With every puzzle you solve, it gets more challenging. Will you be able to fit all the kitties? üòº

As you master each puzzle, you can collect adorable new cats to personalize your gameplay!

PUZZLE CATS FEATURES:

  PLAY WITH CUTE CATS
- Enjoy a variety of adorable cats like cute cats, fat cats, and even some angry cats! üò∫
- Try to fit all the cats in the puzzle without upsetting them!

FUN BLOCK PUZZLES
- Challenge yourself with engaging block puzzles, but now with cute cats instead of regular blocks! üêæ
- Arrange the blocks to fit the board and move to the next level!

COLLECT NEW CATS
- Solve puzzles and level up üéâ
- Collect new cats as you progress in levels!
- Dress up your cats with cute costumes!

TRAIN YOUR BRAIN
- Improve your thinking and spatial reasoning with these shape-based puzzles üß†
- Puzzles become tougher as you advance, keeping the challenge fresh!
games.howToPlayText:
Just drag and drop cats onto the puzzle board and see if you can make them all fit perfectly! 
Each puzzle has its own unique shape and gets more challenging as you play, which will make your brain think differently. With every puzzle you solve, it gets more challenging. Will you be able to fit all the kitties? üòº
